articles.author: Kevin Redfern
articles.title: Indiana announces Darian DeVries as men’s basketball head coach - WBOY.com
articles.description: After just one season as the West Virginia University men’s basketball head coach, Darian DeVries is leaving Morgantown for another head coaching gig.
articles.content:
MORGANTOWN, W.Va. After just one season as the West Virginia University men’s basketball head coach, Darian DeVries is leaving Morgantown for another head coaching gig.
Indiana University announced … [+2365 chars]
